title: Gluten Free Sourdough Starter
directions: Mix all of the ingredients in a glass jar and cover with a muslin cloth and seal it with a rubber band/hair tie.
Let sit in a non drafty place.

Feed the dough 2-3 times a day with 15 g buckwheat flour, 15 g brown rice flour and 30 g water for a week. When the jar gets full just throw away some of the starter or transfer to a bigger jar and continue feeding it.
After a week(7 days) store the sourdough starter in the fridge with the lid on and feed it once a week. Remember to feed the dough every time you've used it for baking.
Leave it in room temperature 12 hours before baking if the recipe calls for an active sourdough starter.
If the sourdough starter separates and liquid starts to form at the top of the starter, pour out the liquid and some of the starter and continue feeding it.
ingredients: 2 tbsp kefir water or "ready" sourdough starter (optional)
